trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs class is used to supply event values to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: A classe WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs é usada para fornecer valores de evento para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos e permitem que você especifique uma identidade personalizada do Windows para a solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>constrói um objeto WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs usando a identidade do Windows fornecida pelo IIS e o atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e o transmite para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>propriedade do objeto WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs fornecido para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>para um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>propriedade durante o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, o Windows a identidade fornecida pelo IIS é usada como a identidade da solicitação atual.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se a autenticação anônima, o IIS usa o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>está definida como a identidade retornada pelo <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: O **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** é gerado somente quando a autenticação <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>é definido como <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>e o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>é um módulo HTTP ativado para o aplicativo.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a newly created instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância recém-criada do <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>constrói um <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>usando a identidade do Windows fornecida pelo IIS e o atual do objeto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e o transmite para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The Windows identity object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de identidade do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The context for the event.
trans-unit.target: O contexto para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objeto para a solicitação HTTP atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>fornece acesso a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>objetos para a solicitação atual.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objeto para a solicitação HTTP atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows identity passed to the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a identidade do Windows passada para o <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"> </xref> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>constrói um <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>usando a identidade do Windows fornecida pelo IIS e o atual do objeto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e o transmite para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, the Identity property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se o IIS usa a autenticação anônima, a propriedade de identidade é definida como a identidade retornada pelo <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Windows identity passed to the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> constructor.
trans-unit.target: A identidade do Windows são passados para o <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"> </xref> construtor.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto a ser associado à solicitação atual.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: You can use the User property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a propriedade do usuário para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>para um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the User property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar um valor para a propriedade do usuário durante o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, o Windows a identidade fornecida pelo IIS é usada como a identidade da solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se a autenticação anônima, o IIS usa o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>está definida como a identidade retornada pelo <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto a ser associado à solicitação atual.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>
